articles.title: SOVRN LAUNCHES COMMERCE AUDIENCES, ALLOWING ADVERTISERS TO REACH IN-MARKET SHOPPERS ACROSS ITS PREMIUM EXCHANGE AND BEYOND
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sovrn launched Sovrn Commerce Audiences, a new offering combining its Commerce business (affiliate software tools for 4,000+ publishers) and the Sovrn Exchange (reaching 500M+ daily active consumers). This allows advertisers to target consumers actively shopping and showing purchase intent.

articles.title: Nvidia to manufacture AI chips in U.S. for first time
articles.author: Finance
articles.summary: Nvidia announced production plans, suggesting the introduction or launch of a new product or service is imminent.

articles.title: I've used Canva for years but it turns out Adobe Express is cheaper, just as good - and free to try
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Adobe is promoting Adobe Express, a new platform for creating visual content like flyers, social media posts, and logos. Adobe Express is designed for ease of use, catering to various skill levels and use cases, with the goal of integrating seamlessly with Adobe's other offerings.

articles.title: Crushon AI Unlocks Unfiltered NSFW AI With Longest Memory
articles.summary: Crushon AI has launched a platform for AI chat and AI companion experiences, offering features like long-form memory and dynamic creativity tools. The platform provides access to over 17 models, including Claude 3.7 Sonnet and GPT-4o. Future integrations such as text-to-speech and text-to-image NSFW generation are being explored.

articles.title: A new startup wants to place ads in AI chatbots. Read the 10-page pitch deck ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Nexad, a new startup, secured $6 million in seed funding. Nexad will use the funding to introduce a new service: placing advertisements in AI applications and creating these advertisements.

articles.title: How Product Visualization is Shaping the Future of Digital Shopping
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Companies such as Nike and BMW are utilizing 3D configurators to enable customers to customize products before purchase. Retailers like IKEA, Wayfair, and Sephora use AR to allow consumers to visualize products in their own spaces or virtually try on makeup. Automakers like Audi and Tesla are implementing VR showrooms to let consumers explore and test drive virtual car models from home, marking the launch and integration of advanced visualization technologies to enhance the customer experience.

articles.title: Helport AI Launches Enhanced AI Software to Modernize Consumer Financing Operations  Apr. 15, 2025 20:31
articles.summary: Helport AI (NASDAQ: HPAI) launched a new AI-powered software for the consumer financing industry. The software automates debt servicing and recovery using real-time AI, and the rollout is led by Helport AI's Philippines office. Helport AI has secured partnerships with three consumer financing companies, including two publicly listed in the U.S.

articles.title: Walmart Is Selling Roborock's $820 Robot Vacuum-Mop for $400 Right Now, and It's a 'Game Changer' for Clean Floors
articles.author: Cameron Le Blanc
articles.summary: The Roborock Q8 Max+ Robot Vacuum and Mop is currently on sale for $400 at Walmart and Amazon, reduced from its original price of $820. This robotic cleaner features LiDAR mapping, strong suction power, mopping functionality with adjustable intensities, and compatibility with Alexa and Google Assistant, providing an improved home cleaning experience.

articles.title: Great Food Expo
articles.summary: Emerging brands and products designed for cooking and eating are being promoted. The products include delicious foods, innovative snacks, mouth-watering desserts, refreshing beverages, and zesty cocktails.

articles.title: A new startup wants to place ads in AI chatbots. Read the 10-page pitch deck it used to raise $6 million.
articles.summary: Nexad, an adtech startup, is developing a native advertising solution for AI apps. The new advertising service is designed to match ads with the right audiences and create ads themselves. Nexad's advertising system runs with a 'flywheel' model and it has onboarded seven AI companies, potentially reaching roughly 30 million consumers.

articles.title: I used the Google Pixel 9a for a week and I'm shocked how good this $500 phone is
articles.author: Mike Andronico
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 9a, a $500 budget phone with the same Tensor G4 processor as the Pixel 9 lineup. The Pixel 9a features a 6.3-inch OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, impressive battery life, and a 48-megapixel main camera, making it a strong competitor in the smartphone market. The phone also promises seven years of software updates.

articles.title: Turn Anything (Seriously, Anything) Into Soft-Serve Ice Cream With Ninja's Newest Device
articles.author: Emily Levin
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl, an upgraded ice cream maker that adds soft-serve functionality to their CREAMi line. This new device can turn various ingredients, from fruits to yogurt, into both scoopable and soft-serve ice cream. The Ninja Swirl offers an upgrade from the CREAMi model, though existing CREAMi owners may consider waiting before upgrading.

articles.title: A new startup wants to place ads in AI chatbots. Read the 10-page pitch deck it used to raise $6 million.
articles.author: Sydney Bradley
articles.summary: Nexad, an adtech startup, is launching a native advertising solution for AI apps. Nexad uses user search queries or messages sent to a chatbot. Along with the AI app's response, Nexad serves an ad relevant to the original search. Nexad's network runs through relationships with advertisers, affiliates, and third parties.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer's 'pretty woman' polka dot dress shoppers say is 'so flattering'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer launched the "Pure Cotton Polka Dot Scoop Neck Midi Waisted Dress" priced at £45, featuring a brown mix polka dot print, defined waist, and midi length skirt. Stock is dwindling fast due to glowing reviews. Alternatively, Next offers a similar style with the "White Spot Sleeveless Scuba Skater Midi Dress" at £69, and New Look has the "Off White Polka Dot Cowl Neck Chiffon Midi Dress" on sale for £35.99.

articles.title: You're Missing Out on Hidden Android Updates
articles.author: Khamosh Pathak
articles.summary: Google is directly delivering security, privacy, and device tracking features to all Android devices through Google Play system updates. This action aims to provide more consistent updates across different Android manufacturers, bypassing the traditional reliance on individual manufacturer updates.

articles.title: This clever tool cleans your gutters without a ladder, and it's down to $28
articles.summary: Orbit introduced the Telescoping Gutter Cleaning Wand, a tool designed to clean gutters from the ground. The wand extends from 40 to 70 inches and has a 180-degree rotating nozzle, allowing users to clean gutters without using a ladder. The product has received positive reviews highlighting its ability to reach high places and clean effectively.

articles.title: Myntra M-Now Brings Global Beauty Brands in 30 Minutes
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Myntra has extended its premium range of international beauty brands on its M-Now platform, offering fast delivery of products from brands like CeraVe, Yves Saint Laurent, MAC Cosmetics, and Dyson. Customers can now access high-quality beauty items with unparalleled efficiency.

articles.title: I Bought The Viral Tyler Glamorous Diva Wash Laundry Detergent And It's Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Tyler Candle Company's Diva Glamorous Wash, a luxury laundry detergent, is now available at Walmart with up to 30% off. The detergent is praised for its perfume-like scent that lasts long on clothes and is used by consumers on towels, bedding and for active wear. Reviewers also suggest mixing it with unscented detergents or using it as a fabric spray.

articles.title: Source: Anthropic could launch a "voice mode" feature for Claude as soon as this month, which will initially roll out on a limited basis (Bloomberg)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Anthropic is expected to launch a voice mode feature for its Claude chatbot this month, initially on a limited basis. This launch occurs nearly a year after OpenAI introduced a similar voice option for ChatGPT.

articles.title: We're Back! Nominate Your Favourite Products Now In The 2025 Viva Beauty Awards
articles.author: Ashleigh Cometti
articles.summary: The Viva Beauty Awards, presented by Glow Lab, are returning for their second year to recognize top beauty products and brands. The awards include categories for skincare, makeup, haircare, body care, fragrance, and wellbeing. Industry experts are invited to nominate existing and newly launched products, with a cut-off date of April 16, 2025, for consideration.

articles.title: Swiggy launches 'Pyng' platform for users to connect with professionals
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Swiggy entered the professional services market with a new offering. Pyng launched its seller app earlier this year.

articles.title: ThunderContent: AI content platform
articles.author: Maziar Foroudian
articles.summary: ThunderContent introduced an AI-powered content creation platform with features including AI Writer, AI Voice Generator, and AI Video Editor to help businesses create high-quality content efficiently. Its AI Writer helps to create SEO-optimized and plagiarism-free content. The platform also offers an AI Chat feature and an AI Voice tool.

articles.title: ButternutAI: AI website builder
articles.author: Maziar Foroudian
articles.summary: ButternutAI has launched a new AI-powered service designed to create professional websites. The service offers features like web and mobile responsiveness and uses proprietary AI technology to understand business needs and target audiences, streamlining the website building process.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers rave about the electric spin scrubber that 'seriously improved' their cleaning routine, and it's now 40% off
articles.author: NISHKA DHAWAN
articles.summary: YKYI has launched the Electric Spin Scrubber, a versatile cleaning tool with eight attachment heads suitable for floors, tiles, and even cars. The scrubber features a long handle, adjustable speeds, a 90-minute battery life, and an LED display. Amazon Prime members can currently purchase it with a 40% discount.

articles.title: 3D Alchemy Officially Launches - A Groundbreaking dApp Bringing AI-Powered 3D Generation to the Solana Blockchain
articles.summary: 3D Alchemy launched a new AI-powered Web3 dApp on Solana, enabling instant 3D model generation from text and image prompts. The platform allows users to create downloadable GLB-format 3D assets for games, VR/AR environments, or digital marketplaces, using the $ALCHAI token to unlock full access.

articles.title: Do laundry detergent sheets really work? What experts say
articles.author: Kelly Vaughan
articles.summary: The article highlights laundry detergent sheets as a lightweight, easy-to-use, and affordable alternative to liquid detergents. Shop TODAY production associate mentioned a new launch of product from a brand whose stain remover is quite popular. The article also recommends sticking to well-established brands like Seventh Generation for dependable laundry detergent sheets.

articles.title: Comcast Launches Five-Year Price Guarantee for Xfinity Internet Customers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Comcast is launching a new Xfinity Internet package with a five-year price guarantee starting at $55 per month, which includes unlimited data and a best-in-class WiFi gateway. Customers can add an Xfinity Mobile line with WiFi PowerBoost, delivering gig speed WiFi, and also get an unlimited Xfinity Mobile line at no cost for a year.

articles.title: Musk Responds to Bombshell Report on His ‘Harem Drama' With a Mathematical Dig
articles.author: Tom Sanders
articles.summary: Promova, a language learning platform, uses AI to personalize learning experiences with features like AI-powered speaking practice. Promova is celebrating its sixth birthday by offering 50 percent off all subscription plans.

articles.title: Cutting-edge tech products, AI shine at 5th China International Consumer Products Expo
articles.summary: The China International Consumer Products Expo showcased cutting-edge tech products, including robotic dogs, ice cream robots, AI notebooks, and digital ski simulators. XPENG displayed their "Land Aircraft Carrier," a flying car, among other intelligent connected new energy vehicles, AI smartphones, smart robots, smart home systems, and wearable products at the expo.

articles.title: AI Travel Agents: AI agents poised to take over travel industry, ET HospitalityWorld
articles.author: www.ETHospitality World.com
articles.summary: Mindtrip has introduced generative AI that creates tailor-made travel itineraries instantly. Expedia launched Romie, an AI assistant, for reservation steps, especially for group trips, while Booking.com introduced Smart Filter for specific recommendations. These AI tools and chatbots are being introduced to enhance and personalize the travel booking experience.

articles.title: Walmart Has a $460 King Mattress on Sale for $228 Right Now, and Shoppers Say They Get 'the Best Sleep' on It
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the SF 10-inch King Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress for $228, which is 50% off the typical price. The SF mattress line has over 1,500 five-star reviews at Walmart. It is a hybrid mattress with foam and springs, offering a comfortable sleeping experience.

articles.title: Chili's trolls McDonald's with its new quarter-pound burger
articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.summary: Chili's is launching a new cheeseburger. The new cheeseburger resembles a McDonald's Quarter Pounder.

articles.title: Lidl launches new service to give shoppers 'priority' over 1 aisle
articles.author: Claire Schofield
articles.summary: Lidl has launched a new "click, reserve and collect" service trial for Lidl Plus customers, giving them priority access to 'Middle of Lidl' items up to two weeks before they are available in stores. The trial launched on April 7th and included the Parkside Robot Lawnmower, available for reservation before its in-store launch on April 24th.

articles.title: Netflix tests a new AI-powered search engine developed by OpenAI
articles.author: Tunahan Karakis
articles.summary: Netflix is testing a new AI-powered search engine developed by OpenAI. The new feature allows iOS users in Australia and New Zealand to search content based on mood and natural language queries. Netflix plans to roll out the engine to the US in the coming weeks after taking user feedback.

articles.title: Acer unveils Super ZX, ZX Pro series phones in India
articles.author: DH Web Desk
articles.summary: Acer will launch its new mobile phones, Super ZX and Super ZX Pro, for purchase on Amazon India starting next week.

articles.title: New Venture Arrives In Parsippany: Wonder Opens Its Doors
articles.author: Vianella Burns
articles.summary: Wonder, a food tech startup, is opening a new brick-and-mortar location in Parsippany, NJ, featuring nine diverse restaurant brands. This location offers meal delivery, pick-up, and limited dine-in options. The concept includes world-renowned chefs and award-winning eateries, allowing customers to order from multiple chefs and restaurants in a single order.

articles.title: These luxe socks are the Father's Day present he'll actually want
articles.author: Lydia Wheatley
articles.summary: Peper Harow launched its SS25 collection, featuring six new styles of socks inspired by British locales like Camden, Cambridge, and Chelsea. The collection incorporates materials like recycled cotton and Supima cotton, focusing on comfort, style, and sustainability.

articles.title: Native body wash review: A $13 cure-all for my severely dry skin
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: Native has launched a new Moisturizing Body Wash, a sulfate-free formula infused with 7% shea butter and available in six new scents. The body wash is designed to cleanse and moisturize skin, offering a more hydrating alternative to Native's original body wash line. It is priced at $13 for 18 fluid ounces.

articles.title: Haier Small Domestic Appliances Shine at the 137th Canton Fair with "Care for Your Loves with AI"  Apr. 15, 2025 14:24
articles.summary: Haier Small Domestic Appliances (SDA) debuted its latest AI-driven innovations at the Canton Fair, showcasing products like the AI-Powered Ironing Machine and Dual-Compression Dehumidifier. These products embody the "AI for Home, AI for You" theme, emphasizing user-centric design and personalized solutions, along with their commitment to the "think global, act local" strategy.

articles.title: ⚡Know Acer Super ZX, Acer Super ZX Pro Price, Specifications and Features
articles.summary: Acer has launched the Super ZX and Super ZX Pro smartphones in India, marking the brand's return to the industry. The new Acer Super ZX series targets the entry and mid-range segments.

articles.title: Surf launches Magnifi-Scent Wash laundry liquids for short washing cycles
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Unilever's Surf brand has launched the Magnifi-Scent Wash detergent range, available in Floral Fusion, Sunshine Blossom, and Aqua Bliss, designed for short laundry cycles. This launch follows the successful introduction of Persil's Wonder Wash range and is supported by a significant marketing campaign. Surf had also relaunched its laundry detergents with 'new and improved' fragrances backed by a £7m campaign last September.

articles.title: 4 reasons I don't regret buying the budget Kindle over the Paperwhite
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Amazon's base Kindle is presented as a cost-effective e-reader option, priced at $110, appealing to first-time users. While lacking the waterproof feature of the Kindle Paperwhite, its compact design, glare-free E Ink display, and sufficient battery life make it a practical choice for reading ebooks. Its affordability makes it an excellent entry point for those new to the Kindle ecosystem.

articles.title: Composing and Combining Photos with AI has Breakthrough Image Control
articles.author: Donna Hancock
articles.summary: A new Text → Image → Text model generates images onto t-shirts. This model can caption, describe, answer, retrieve, and generate under a single architecture, providing a new service for customized apparel.

articles.title: ChatGPT 新增功能：AI 創作圖片區域
articles.author: Tech Ritual
org: 出品｜虎嗅科技組作者｜桑治思杭編輯｜苗正卿頭圖｜視覺中國智譜準備第一個闖關。據虎嗅獲悉，北京智譜華章…
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new image library feature in ChatGPT for all free, Plus, and Pro users on mobile and web. This feature allows users to easily access their automatically generated images within ChatGPT. Users can find a new "Library" area in the sidebar to view a grid of created images, with a button for creating new images.

articles.title: Make laundry feel less like a chore with these expert-approved finds, starting at $5
articles.author: Sierra Hoeger
articles.summary: The article highlights several laundry-related products for stain removal and garment care. The Sealegend Dryer Vent Cleaner Kit aids in cleaning dryer vents. Oxiclean Maxforce Laundry Stain Remover Spray removes spills on fabrics. A portable clothes dryer features UV lighting for extra cleaning.

articles.title: NIQ Unveils BASES AI Screener: Helping CPG Brands Thrive in the Age of Hyper-Innovation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NielsenIQ (NIQ) has launched BASES AI Screener, a real-time AI-powered idea screening tool designed for innovation cycles. This new platform combines NIQ's consumer panel data, innovation database, and predictive models with AI to mimic human reactions for efficient idea screening. It provides benefits like reliable insights, accelerated timelines, and cost-effective results for CPG companies.

articles.title: Dyson's new airwrap id promises ‘perfect curls with no heat damage' – but did it work?
articles.author: Elena Chabo
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new version of its Airwrap hair styling tool designed for curly to coily hair. The reviewer tested the device and its various attachments, including a volumizing brush, diffuser, wide-tooth comb, fast dryer, and conical barrel, to assess its ease of use, results, and style longevity.

articles.title: The Case For 'Scentscaping' Your Wedding, According To A Fragrance-Obsessed Bride
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: Zola highlights the growing trend of 'scentscaping,' where couples create signature scents for their weddings. Olfactory NYC offers custom fragrance services, creating bespoke scents inspired by wedding locations and also provides custom diffusers. Brands like Jo Malone, Diptyque, Maison Louis Marie, and Phlur are also recommended for their wedding-appropriate candles and diffusers featuring floral and comforting notes, providing couples with diverse options for enhancing their special day.

articles.title: All the bargains hitting Aldi middle aisle this week – from garden gadgets to laundry essentials starting at £1.49
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new 'Specialbuys' on April 17th, including a Corded Mini Circular Saw, Ferrex Patio and Wall Cleaner, Small Pressure Washer, Foldable Handtruck, Decoy Security Camera Light, and a Video Doorbell.  These products, along with pet food, laundry baskets, and beauty buys, will be available while stocks last.

articles.title: ⚡JK Tech CEO Sameer Nagpal Says India Becoming a Global AI Leader Under PM Narendra Modi's Vision
articles.summary: Redmi launched its new budget smartphone, Redmi A5, in India. The rumored 'iPhone Fold' will reportedly use Samsung OLED panels for its display.

articles.title: This meal subscription service is the easiest sustainability hack
articles.summary: Fresh Prep, a Canadian meal kit delivery service, offers 18 chef-inspired recipes and 28 ready-to-eat meals weekly, catering to various dietary needs like vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free. Their 'Zero Waste Kit' minimizes single-use plastics, and the service prioritizes local, Canadian ingredients, reducing food waste and supporting sustainable food systems.

articles.title: This tiny drink cooling robot has finally hit Kickstarter
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Yukai Engineering launched Nékojita FuFu, a small robot designed to cool food and drinks. Available for pre-order on Kickstarter for ¥3,550 (around $25 USD), the USB-C rechargeable device can reduce temperatures by up to 30 degrees in three minutes.

articles.title: FORTUNE Names Cintas Corporation One of America's Most Innovative Companies in 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cintas Corporation was named one of America's Most Innovative Companies in 2025 for its ability to develop innovative products and streamline processes. The company continually evolves and improves its products and services, including uniforms, mats, mops, restroom supplies, workplace water services, and safety products, to meet the ever-changing needs of customers.

articles.title: Tide Loads of Hope Does a Load of Good With Ronald McDonald House Charities® (RMHC) Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tide Loads of Hope and RMHC Canada are celebrating their partnership on National Laundry Day. Tide is enhancing and expanding laundry programs at Ronald McDonald House locations across Canada, providing families with the comforts of home.

articles.title: This free Android update brings one huge security feature to your phone
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Google is rolling out a new feature through Play Services that automatically restarts Android devices if they've been locked for three days or more. This update puts the device in a 'Before First Unlock' state, requiring a passcode for access, enhancing security against data theft and unauthorized access.

articles.title: Tide Loads of Hope Does a Load of Good With Ronald McDonald House Charities® (RMHC) Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tide Loads of Hope, in partnership with Ronald McDonald House Charities Canada, is expanding laundry programs at Ronald McDonald House and Ronald McDonald Family Room locations across Canada. This expansion aims to provide families with the comforts of home during challenging times. Tide has contributed over 25,000 loads of laundry to families in need in 2023.

articles.title: Posted Apr 15, 2025 at 8:04 AM EDT
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Google requires a minimum of 32GB of storage for Android 15 devices to license Google Mobile Services (GMS). Supporting the Play Store necessitates meeting this new storage requirement.

articles.title: If Your Main Priority In Your Thirties Is 'Be As Comfortable As Possible,' These 43 Products Will Be Your MVPs
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features a collection of products available on Amazon, including the Olay Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides, which offers 24-hour hydration.  It also introduces the Hatch Restore 3, a sunrise alarm and sound machine designed to improve sleep routines, along with the Aloderma Organic Aloe Vera Gel for full-body moisturizing and skin calming.

articles.title: Tide Loads of Hope Does a Load of Good With Ronald McDonald House Charities® (RMHC) Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tide, Canada's #1 trusted laundry detergent brand, and Ronald McDonald House Charities Canada are enhancing and expanding laundry programs at Ronald McDonald House and Ronald McDonald Family Room program locations across the country. This initiative celebrates the impact of Tide Loads of Hope's commitment to providing families with the comforts of home.

articles.title: NoScrubs: $2 Million Raised For Transforming Laundry Service Industry
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: NoScrubs, a technology company, launched a laundry service platform. The company connects customers with laundry facilities for clean, folded laundry and secured $2 million in pre-seed funding to advance market expansion and technology development, including integrating robotics for delivery.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus With SD 7s Gen 2 SoC, built-in stylus Launched In India: Price, Specifications
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus in India, featuring a pOLED display, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, 50MP triple camera setup, and a 5,000mAh battery. The smartphone is priced at Rs 22,999 for the 8GB RAM + 256GB storage variant and will be available for retail starting April 23, 2025, via Flipkart and select retail stores.

articles.title: An "AI Shampoo Shop" store in Guangzhou, China, where artificial intelligence (AI) automatically cle..
articles.author: The Last Day
articles.summary: An "AI Shampoo Shop" in Guangzhou, China, features artificial intelligence (AI) devices that automatically clean hair. The device checks scalp condition, selects appropriate shampoo, adjusts water spray, and offers adjustable intensity and hair length modes. The service takes approximately 13 minutes and costs 19 yuan (about 3,700 won) per session.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra effectively available with Rs 12,000 discount: 5 reasons to buy, 1 to skip
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, a premium phone with enhanced AI features, improved camera capabilities, and a powerful Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. The phone features a slightly larger display and design changes for better handling, but the S Pen has lost Bluetooth support.  Samsung is offering deals on the Galaxy S25 Ultra, including discounts and exchange offers.

articles.title: NIQ Launches BASES AI Screener for CPG Success
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: NielsenIQ (NIQ) has launched BASES AI Screener, an AI-powered idea screening tool that leverages consumer panel data and generative AI to provide insights for innovation. The tool offers benefits such as accelerated timelines, cost-effective results, and reliable, predictive insights for CPG companies.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus launched at Rs 22,999: Check features, availability and more
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 60 Stylus in India, expanding its Edge 60 series. The smartphone features a built-in stylus, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, and a 50MP camera. It is priced starting at Rs 21,999 and available on Flipkart, the Motorola India website, and select retail stores starting April 23.

articles.title: Amazon knocks 58% off Elizabeth Arden's anti-ageing cream that soaks into skin 'like magic'
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Elizabeth Arden's Visible Difference Replenishing HydraGel Complex anti-ageing cream is now available at a 58% discount on Amazon. The cream, known for its lightweight gel texture and hydrating properties, aims to minimize fine lines and wrinkles. It has garnered positive reviews, with customers reporting smooth skin and improved skin tone.

articles.title: The Shark MessMaster Vacuum Is Just $90 at Amazon
articles.author: Clint Davis
articles.summary: The Shark MessMaster Portable Wet-Dry Vacuum is introduced as a compact and powerful cleaning solution for cars and homes. It features impressive suction, a 1-gallon dishwasher-safe dust canister, and an AnyBag feature for convenient bag usage. Currently available on Amazon, it's designed for cleaning up various debris like sand, dirt, crumbs, and pet hair.

articles.title: Al Masaood Automobiles Rolls Out the All-New Nissan Magnite Across its Showrooms
articles.summary: Al Masaood Automobiles has launched the all-new Nissan Magnite in Abu Dhabi, Al Ain, and the Western Region. The Magnite is a compact SUV featuring intelligent technology, enhanced safety, and a turbocharged 1.0-litre engine.

articles.title: Next's £29 corduroy shacket in four colours is 'the perfect lightweight layer'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is offering a Neutral Corduroy Lightweight Shacket, available in multiple colors and featuring an oversized fit, front pockets, and button fastening. Marks & Spencer is selling a Pure Cotton Denim Relaxed Shacket, made of cotton. Both shackets are receiving positive reviews from shoppers.

articles.title: How to make Taco Bell's Crunchwrap Supreme at home — only better
articles.author: Aaron Hutcherson
articles.summary: Taco Bell introduced the Crunchwrap Supreme as a limited-time offering in 2005. Due to its immediate success, it became a permanent item on Taco Bell's menu the following year. The Crunchwrap Supreme features seasoned beef, nacho cheese sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, and a crunchy tostada wrapped in a grilled flour tortilla.

articles.title: Breaking Barriers: Permate's Innovative Approach to Vietnam's Affiliate Market
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Permate, developed by Nguyen Duy, is launching a new affiliate marketplace in Vietnam aiming to disrupt the traditional affiliate network model. The platform connects brands and publishers directly, offering commission rates and direct support and utilizes a marketplace model similar to e-commerce companies like Shopee, and global solutions, such as Impact, ShareASale, CJ, and Awin, to help brands and publishers in Vietnam connect in new ways.

articles.title: Popular international beauty brands available on Myntra's M-Now
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Myntra is expanding its M-Now service to include premium international beauty brands, offering delivery in as little as 30 minutes. The expanded range includes products from brands like CeraVe, Yves Saint Laurent, MAC Cosmetics, Dyson, Carolina Herrera, Estee Lauder, Clinique, COSRX, and Prada. This aims to provide Myntra's premium customers immediate access to high-quality beauty products.

articles.title: Google doesn't want Android phones to ship with 16GB storage anymore: Here's why
articles.summary: Google is introducing new requirements for Android 15 devices. Devices must now ship with a minimum of 32GB of internal storage. Cellular devices launching with Android 15 must also offer the option to share emergency contact data with Android Emergency Location Service.

articles.title: Redmi A5 Debuts in India: Redefining Entry-Level Smartphones with Power and Innovation
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Xiaomi India has launched the Redmi A5, a new entry-level smartphone featuring a 120Hz display, a 32MP AI dual camera, and a 5200mAh battery. The Redmi A5 comes with Android 15, two years of software updates, and four years of security patches, priced at INR 6499/- for 3GB+64GB and INR 7499/- for 4GB+128GB.

articles.title: It's Time To *Finally* Indulge In These 28 Beauty Products That Have Collected Dust In Your Cart
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Dyson released the new Bluetooth-compatible Dyson Airwrap i.d. hair styling tool that pairs with an app to offer personalized styling routines based on user hair type and length, reviewers also highlight the new Conical Airwrap barrel's ability to style closer to the root.

articles.title: Affordable Stylus smartphone? Motorola Edge 60 Stylus launched in India
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 60 Stylus in India, a mid-range smartphone featuring a built-in stylus. The device boasts specifications such as a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 5,000mAh battery with 68W wired and 15W wireless charging, and a triple camera system with a 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C main sensor.

articles.title: Taapsee Pannu named NIVEA's First Indian Global Ambassador; launches NIVEA Soft Daily UV
articles.summary: NIVEA has launched NIVEA Soft Daily UV, a lightweight daily moisturizer providing 48-hour hydration and 88% UV protection. The product contains Vitamin E, Shea Butter, and Jojoba Extracts. Taapsee Pannu is the brand's first Indian Global Brand Ambassador for this launch.

articles.title: L'Oréal BIG BANG Beauty Tech Innovation Program 2025: Innovating for a Smarter, More Sustainable Future
articles.author: L'Oréal
articles.summary: L'Oréal China launched the 2025 L'Oréal BIG BANG Beauty Tech Innovation Program, focusing on accelerating innovation in digitalization, operations, and R&I. The program includes tracks like Phygital Consumers Experience, Future Science, Operation 4.0, and Sustainability, inviting startups to co-create future beauty solutions with innovative technologies.

articles.title: Motorola Launches Edge 60 Stylus - Brings Segment's First Built-in Stylus with AI Sketch to Image Segment-Leading Sony LYTIA 700C Camera Segment Leading Moto AI Features and a 6.7' Super HD 1.5K Flat
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, the first smartphone in its segment with a built-in stylus, designed for creators and multitaskers. The device features a 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C camera, a 6.7' 1.5K Super HD pOLED display, and AI-powered tools, with a starting price of INR 21,999 and will be available for purchase from April 23, 2025.

articles.title: Motorola Unveils Game-Changing Edge60 Stylus with Built-in Stylus
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola launched the edge60 stylus, an AI-powered smartphone aimed at creators and tech enthusiasts, equipped with a built-in stylus. It features a 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C sensor for enhanced photo and video capabilities, a 6.7-inch pOLED display with Dolby Atmos speakers, and moto AI integration. Available from April 23, 2025, the edge60 stylus will be priced starting at INR 21,999.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy XCover7 Pro & Tab Active5 Pro Launched
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy XCover7 Pro and Tab Active5 Pro, durable devices designed for challenging work environments. The Tab Active5 Pro features a robust 10,100mAh battery with hot-swap functionality, while both devices offer IP68-rated water and dust resistance, enhanced speaker technology and MIL-STD-810H-certified designs.

articles.title: First Look: Slate Debuting Affordable Electric Vehicle This Month
articles.author: Eileen Falkenberg-Hull
articles.summary: Slate, a new American electric vehicle company, is poised to disrupt the car market with an inexpensive compact electric vehicle. The company, led by auto industry veterans, will fully reveal its vehicle on April 24.

articles.title: Woolies bid to make food fresher
articles.summary: Woolworths is establishing a new distribution centre in western Sydney. This facility aims to deliver fresher produce more quickly to customers in Sydney.

articles.title: Woolies bid to make food fresher
articles.summary: Woolworths is introducing a new state-of-the-art distribution centre in western Sydney. This initiative promises Sydney customers fresher produce and faster delivery.

articles.title: Here's why you need to make a BB cream with SPF your ultimate summer makeup essential
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: The content introduces BB creams with SPF from several companies including Nivea, Burt's Bees, Klairs, La Roche-Posay, IPKN, Maybelline, Smashbox, and REVLON. These creams function as moisturizers, foundations, and sunscreens. Each product offers unique benefits, such as hydration, sun protection, skin tone evening, and anti-aging properties, catering to different skin types.

articles.title: This teases ‘This Is' range in departure from meat mimics
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: This is launching a new 'This Is' range of clean label products, described as revolutionary and all-natural. The products, which have been in development for two years, are expected to disrupt the plant-based food category and will be available in the coming weeks.

articles.title: Motorola Launches Edge60 Stylus- with Segment's First Built-in Stylus, Moto AI Sketch to Image, Segment Leading Camera and a 1.5K Flat Display at Just Rs. 21,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, a new AI-powered smartphone with a built-in stylus designed for creators and multitaskers. The device features a 50MP Sony LYTIA 700C camera, a 6.7" 1.5K Super HD pOLED display, and AI-powered tools and will be available for purchase from April 23rd on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores, with a launch price starting at INR 21,999.

articles.title: Motorola launches edge60 stylus- with segment's first built-in stylus, moto AI sketch to Image, segment leading camera and a 1.5K flat display at just Rs. 21,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, the segment's first smartphone with a built-in stylus, designed for creators and multitaskers. The smartphone features a 50MP camera, a 6.7" display, and AI-powered tools. It will be available from April 23rd, 2025, on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores, with a launch price of INR 22,999 and effective price of INR 21,999 with offers.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Price in India, Specifications and Features Revealed, Know All Key Details Here
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Stylus in India on April 15. The smartphone features a built-in stylus, Sony camera, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 6.67-inch pOLED display, and a 50MP triple rear camera setup. The Edge 60 Stylus will be available for purchase starting April 23 on Flipkart, the official website, and retail stores, priced at INR 22,999.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus launched in India at ₹22,999 with Jio benefits
articles.author: ETTelecom
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Stylus smartphone in India, priced at ₹22,999, with bundled benefits from Reliance Jio. The smartphone features a built-in stylus, a 6.7-inch pOLED display, a 50MP dual-rear camera, and runs on the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset.

articles.title: Kling AI 2.0 Global Launch: China-Based AI Company Unveils Kling 2.0, Next-Gen Video Generator With New Updates, Improving Upon Kling 1.6 Model
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Kling AI launched its next-generation AI video generator, Kling 2.0, showcasing its enhanced fidelity, prompt adherence, and ability to create high-quality cinematic videos during a global launch event live-streamed on X and YouTube. The new Kling AI video generator handles different types of prompts.

articles.title: Motorola launches edge60 stylus with AI-powered sketch to image capability
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Motorola launched the motorola edge60 stylus smartphone in India, featuring an integrated stylus and generative AI capabilities. The phone will be available starting April 23 via Flipkart and leading retail stores, priced at Rs 22,999, with potential discounts and deals for certain customers.

articles.title: Peak Milk Reinforces Quality Dairy Nutrition, Introduces Affordable Peak Mini
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC's Peak Milk has introduced Peak Mini, a smaller, more affordable pack of its signature Peak Evaporated Milk, reinforcing its commitment to nourishing Nigerians with quality dairy nutrition. The brand is providing high-quality dairy products to consumers.

articles.title: Redmi A5 Launched in India: Redefining Entry-Level Smartphones with Power and Innovation
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: Xiaomi India launched the Redmi A5, an entry-level smartphone featuring a 120Hz display, 32MP AI dual camera, and a smooth processor. The Redmi A5 features a 6.88-inch HD+ display, a 5200mAh battery with a 15W fast charger, and runs on Android 15 with guaranteed software and security updates. It is available in two storage variants, 3GB+64GB and 4GB+128GB, starting April 16, 2025, on Mi.com, Amazon, Flipkart, and leading retail outlets.

articles.title: 6.7 ଇଞ୍ଚ ଡିସପ୍ଲେ ସହ ଲଞ୍ଚ ହେଲା Motoର ନୂଆ ଫୋନ; ଦାମ ଏତିକି
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Motorola, a sub-brand of Lenovo, launched the Edge 60 STYLUS smartphone in the Indian market. The handset features a 6.7-inch 120Hz 1.5K screen, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, AI features like Sketch to Image and Glance AI, a 50MP main camera, and a 5000mAh battery with 68W fast charging. The sale for Motorola Edge 60 STYLUS will start from 23th Apr'25 on Flipkart and leading retail stores.

articles.title: Discover the future of consumption at Hainan expo
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: The 5th China International Consumer Products Expo featured the introduction of over 600 new products. China also launched the first cross-region hydrogen heavy-duty truck route.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Launched At Rs 22,999 With Built-in Stylus: Availability, Specs And More
articles.author: Naba Ali
articles.summary: Motorola is expanding its Edge series in India with the launch of the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, featuring a built-in stylus. The smartphone starts at Rs 21,999 and includes specs like a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 50-megapixel main camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with fast charging.

articles.title: ⚡Meta To Train Its AI Models Using EU User Data
articles.summary: OpenAI is reportedly developing a screenless AI-powered smartphone to compete with the iPhone. The project involves former Apple designer Jony Ive.

articles.title: LambdaTest Launches HyperExecute MCP Server to Automate Testing Setups with AI
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: LambdaTest has launched HyperExecute MCP Server, an enhancement to its AI-native test orchestration platform, HyperExecute. This update introduces the Model Context Protocol (MCP), which streamlines automated testing workflows and reduces setup time. LambdaTest aims to improve developer experience and testing efficiency.

articles.title: An artificial intelligence (AI) shampoo shop that cleans hair in China has emerged and is drawing at..
articles.author: Back Jiyeon
articles.summary: An AI shampoo shop has launched in Guangzhou, China, offering an automated hair washing service. Customers lie on a massage bed and place their head in the AI device, which analyzes the scalp and automatically washes the hair with selected shampoo, using continuous water spray adjustments. The process, including two shampoos, one treatment, and seven rinses, takes approximately 13 minutes.

articles.title: Cream Stone Introduces TUBZ: Premium Ice Creams for At-Home Indulgence
articles.author: Hyderabad
articles.summary: Cream Stone, a boutique ice cream maker, launched TUBZ, a new premium range of packaged ice creams. This move marks Cream Stone's entry into the retail market to extend the brand's luxury ice creams to home environments. TUBZ is available at Cream Stone outlets in Hyderabad and via Swiggy Instamart, offering a variety of flavors in family-sized and personal portions.

articles.title: We found a dupe for the viral Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum cream
articles.author: Mia Erickson
articles.summary: Epzen, an Australian skincare company, has launched three new body washes. The 'Skin Drench Triple Moisture Wash' is a hydrating wash with scents of caramel, coconut, and pistachio. 'Smooth Mover Clearing Body Wash' targets body acne with salicylic acid and AHAs, while 'Delicate Diva Sensitive Body Wash' is designed for sensitive skin with a coconut and vanilla scent.

articles.title: Study: 2.5 MILLION Servings of Maggi Instant Noodles are Consumed in Malaysia Every Day!
articles.author: Renushara
articles.summary: Nestlé Malaysia views product innovation as a key long-term growth strategy. The company plans to expand and diversify its product portfolio while leveraging local expertise to formulate and produce products tailored to regional tastes. Nestlé Malaysia also intends to continue investing in increasing its production capabilities to support its innovation-driven agenda.

articles.title: Seragem announced on the 15th that it will hold the first "Powe Fitting Service" in the massage home..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: Seragem is launching a 'Powze fitting service' that allows customers who purchase the 'Powze M8 Fit' massage chair to customize its side covers with 12 different designs in varying colors and materials. As a promotional offer for the launch of Fauze M8 Fit, Serrajem will provide a 50% discount on the fitting service for customers who purchase the Fauze M8 Fit from April to May.

articles.title: Taapsee Pannu joins Nivea as Indian global brand ambassador
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Nivea India has launched Nivea Soft Daily UV, a new moisturizer with 48-hour hydration and UV protection, featuring Taapsee Pannu as their first Indian global brand ambassador. The launch is supported by a TV campaign highlighting the product's ease of use and effectiveness in daily skincare, addressing the need for hydration with UV protection.

articles.title: OpenAI unveils GPT-4.1 AI models focused on coding tasks
articles.summary: OpenAI has unveiled a new series of models called GPT-4.1, including the variants GPT-4.1 mini and GPT-4.1 nano. These multimodal models are optimized for coding and instruction-following tasks, handling up to one million tokens. They are available via OpenAI's API.

articles.title: The State News Crossword, April 15, 2025
articles.summary: StateNews.com is launching its new website and encourages users to test it out.

articles.title: Show HN: Streaming Platform for Global Content (Need Testers)
articles.summary: YADROP.COM, a new streaming platform, offers a lightweight, fast, and clean solution for watching live global content across devices. It aims to address frustrations with bloated apps, buffering issues, and complicated setups.

articles.title: '美團閃購'品牌正式發佈，此前非餐即時零售日單量已超1800萬
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 美團表示，即日起全國消費者可在美團
機器之心報導編輯：杜偉今天淩晨，
articles.summary: Meituan has officially launched its instant retail brand, 'Meituan Flash Sale'. The brand aims to provide a 24-hour shopping platform, partnering with retailers to offer a wide range of products for delivery within 30 minutes. Meituan Flash Sale intends to meet the growing consumer demand for instant retail and facilitate the digital upgrade of local retail industries.

articles.title: One Nintendo Switch 2 Game Feels Like History Repeating Itself
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch, its first hybrid console, after the Wii U's failure. The Nintendo Switch was also one of Nintendo's pricier systems at the time of launch.

articles.title: Better affordability? Nestle launches 'milk plus soy' kids drink in the Philippines
articles.author: Tingmin Koe
articles.summary: Nestle has launched BEAR BRAND MILK N' SOY in the Philippines, a product combining dairy and plant-based protein aimed at school-age children. This new product is designed to be affordable and address nutritional needs, leveraging innovative enzyme-based technology to improve the texture and taste of the milk and soy blend.

articles.title: Google Chrome update for Android expands on-screen space for websites
articles.author: Alfonso Maruccia
articles.summary: Google is rolling out the edge-to-edge feature to Chrome 135, enabling developers to utilize the entire screen height and width of smartphones.  This new feature allows apps to draw content behind Android's system bars.

articles.title: 27 Home Improvement Products You Should Buy Now That Winter's Over
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: The article features a Bissell multi-purpose carpet cleaner for stain removal from floors, carpets, and upholstery, with a strong suction. Also, it highlights a Levoit air purifier with a three-stage HEPA filtration system for removing allergens, odors, and airborne particles. These products aim to help with spring cleaning.

articles.title: Tencent-backed household robot maker Narwal raises US$100 million ahead of pre-IPO round
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Narwal is using funding to develop a new AI-powered household product. Narwal is known for its existing line of robot vacuums and mops.

articles.title: Empowering FMCG Brand Growth Through Retailer Engagement
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Ninja Mart is helping Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) brands, Indofood and Yupi, expand into Malaysian retail markets by providing them with data-driven insights, retailer engagement, and targeted marketing strategies. These services aim to improve distribution and increase brand visibility within both urban and rural areas, which resulted in sales growth and improved market penetration for the brands.

articles.title: 'I've tried all the newest K-beauty products. These are the best ones.'
articles.author: Juna Xu
articles.summary: The article highlights several new Korean skincare products, including a hypoallergenic toner, azelaic acid formula, Bakuchiol serum, Panthenol serum, vitamin C toner pads from Innisfree, a niacinamide toner, Anua's collagen mask, Medicube's foam cleanser, Ilso's toner pads, and a sebum softener. These products target various skin concerns such as acne, dryness, fine lines, hyperpigmentation, and clogged pores.

articles.title: Hyundai Motor releases revamped Avante with upgraded features
articles.author: Chang Dong-Woo
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Co. has launched a revamped model of the Avante compact sedan. The new Avante features upgraded convenience and driver assistance systems as standard. The Modern trim now includes highway driving assist and navigation-based smart cruise control.

articles.title: Technology helps spur consumer market
articles.author: 许嘉怡
articles.summary: Bloomage Biotech is advancing its global strategy in medical devices. CP Group signed a deal to support elderly health and chronic disease recovery using diet. Zeekr is developing smart car cabins that understand user experience and translate voice commands into actions. AI is also driving new consumer products such as precision skin care and intelligent health management.

articles.title: OWN DREAM 2025 Global Launch: Merging Eastern Philosophy and AI to Redefine Luxury Fashion
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: OWN DREAM, an innovative fashion brand, is introducing AI-driven tailoring and sustainable design. These offerings aim to redefine premium menswear in global markets.

articles.title: Bloomberg Expands Thematic Commodities Index Suite with Launch of the Bloomberg Global Commodity Transition Metals Index
articles.author: The Kane Republican
articles.summary: Bloomberg announced the launch of a new product.

articles.title: Cutting-edge tech products, AI shine at 5th China International Consumer Products Expo
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: The China International Consumer Products Expo in Haikou showcases new tech products. These include robotic dogs designed for delivery, robots that autonomously produce ice cream, smart notebooks with AI writing capabilities, and digital ski simulators.

articles.title: AI Agents Are Not Just Chatbots. Here's How They're Different
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Yum! Brands is implementing AI agents across its fast-food chains like Taco Bell and KFC to take orders, improve drive-thru efficiency, and create action plans. Jotform has also developed agents for their customers, improving and refining their capabilities internally as well.

articles.title: Dangbei's new N2 Mini projector promises high-end versatility on a budget, and it's already on sale
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: Dangbei released the N2 Mini, a budget-friendly projector designed for compact and affordable streaming. The projector features an integrated gimbal stand to offer flexible design.

articles.title: Motorola launches edge60 stylus with AI-powered sketch to image capability
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Segment is launching its first smartphone, which features an integrated stylus. This represents a new product introduction from the company.
